wikipedia_page.main: John Ryan (born 1939) is a Welsh rugby union coach. Following success as a coach with Newport RFC and Cardiff RFC he was Head Coach of the Wales national rugby union team from 1988 to 1990. At the time he was the first Wales coach to have not played for the national team.
